security_audit.summary: All 13 static findings are false positives. The scanner misinterpreted markdown code formatting (backticks) as shell commands, configuration documentation as sensitive data access, and normal Chinese text as obfuscated content. This SKILL.md file contains only documentation describing workflow orchestration.

content.value_statement: Automate the entire content creation workflow from trend discovery to publication. Connect independent skills into a single pipeline that produces verified, ready-to-post content without manual intervention.
actual_capabilities: Discovers trending topics from TopHub hotæ¦œå•
Generates draft content using Defou x Stanley style
Produces optimized final content ready for publishing
limitations: Depends on other skills for content generation and verification
Requires TopHub access for trend data
Output quality depends on underlying AI model performance

best_practices: Run during off-peak hours for faster execution
Combine with topic selection skills for better results
anti_patterns: Running without understanding the dependency skills
Expecting real-time content on rapidly changing news
Skipping verification step for urgent posts

faq.question: What skills does this orchestrator call?
faq.answer: It orchestrates tophub-defou-stanley-combo for content generation and viral-verification for quality scoring.

faq.question: How long does a full run take?
faq.answer: Typical runs complete in 2-5 minutes depending on topic count and content complexity.

faq.question: Can I skip the verification step?
faq.answer: The orchestrator includes verification by design. Modify the skill code to change this behavior.

faq.question: Where are outputs stored?
faq.answer: Drafts go to outputs/defou-stanley-posts/ and verified posts go to outputs/viral-verified-posts/.

faq.question: Does it need API keys?
faq.answer: It uses the project's global .env configuration. Set up required API keys in your environment.

faq.question: Can I customize the selection criteria?
faq.answer: Modify the underlying skills (tophub-defou-stanley-combo or viral-verification) to adjust selection logic.
